blogHeading: React component and hooks library Mantine
blogContent: Yesterday I was looking for a full blown react component library. I was scrolling on youtube and saw the latest video of fireship. There he recommended This React library Mantine. I checked out Mantine's website immediately. I was not sure about this library if it is any better than Material Ui (which i usually use). But this library had everything i ever wanted from a library. I has many components like modal, text area, date picker etc. But the most impressive thing is that it has many kinds of React hooks built into it. It has a nice ui and also its syntax and structure is easier to understand. Here is the link of this site - https://mantine.dev . I hope you like this library as much as I did. Good Day to you.
